2007-05-04

Declare Independence


Coachella 2007: Bjork
(originally uploaded by Brian Romero)

I've now heard two tracks from Bjork's new album Volta and they are both effing awesome - the album is on its way from One Little Indian and frankly I can't wait...


  • Declare Independence (mp3) (via Indie Selections For Your Erections)
  • Earth Intruders (mp3) (via KEXP blog)
